name: Feedspot full screen clear interface
description:
Some redesign for Feedspot:
  • Full screen for large monitors.
  • Unread articles mark more.
  • Hidden extra blocks.
  • Easy position for "Go up" and "Add new" buttons.
additional_info:
Version 0.7.4b
  • Remove button "Gold"
Version 0.7.4
  • All posts have 100% width now
  • Button "Mark as read" change position. There is in top menu.
Version 0.7.3b
  • Fixed some bugs with change page makeup
Version 0.7.3
  • "Add new site" position changed for resolve bug on other pages
  • Resolved bug with mark of unreadable articles in expanded view
  • Buttons "Mark unread" and "Email" returned
Version 0.7.2b
  • Changed color for current row.
  • Added screenshots
Version 0.7.1b.
  • Full screen for large monitors.
  • Unread articles mark more.
  • Hidden extra blocks.
  • Easy position for "Go up" and "Add new" buttons.
